content: I was wondering, is the source code for tactics such as intro and assumption? The results on loogle only show the name declaration
In VS Code: right click on a tactic and do "go to definition" to see the implementation, and "go to declaration" to see the syntax definition.

Kyle Miller said:

In VS Code: right click on a tactic and do "go to definition" to see the implementation, and "go to declaration" to see the syntax definition.

thanks!
nrs has marked this topic as resolved.
